name: Roll with the Flow (Lpf-Game)
description:
ROLL WITH THE FLOW:

*make sure to press the fullscreen button at the down-left-corner*

SHOOT WITH YOU'RE FIST GUN AT AI TO MAKE HIM ROLL OVER THE ALIENS; AND THUS SQUISHING THEM TO DEATH:

CONTROLS:

-MOVE WITH WASD OR THE ARROWKEYS

-SHOOT WITH LEFT MOUSE BUTTON

hOPE YOU LIKE AND LEAVE A COMMENT IF YOU WANT ME TO PLAY YOU'RE GAME :)
